website_summaries.verdict: With its ease of use and good functionality, the AGS is an attractive option for users on a budget.
pros: The AGS is simple to setup and has no issues with its Bluetooth connectivity
Users who type slowly have reported preferring this keyboard because of its slightly reduced response time
cons: The AGS loses marks for the loud beep it emits at every keystroke, which may annoy users or those around them

customer_reviews.title: Neat toy.  Not practical.
customer_reviews.text: As most of the reviews said, this is a neat toy, but not practical for daily use. The keyboard is small (like typing on a tablet). Since it is a laser, you would think they would make the keyboard full size or give the option to switch between the two. I really don't use it because I am frustrated. I am giving it a 4 for the cool factor. Also, some of the keys are moved to an additional row above the function keys so you need to learn a "new" keyboard to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ski

customer_reviews.title: Works just as expected, not a toy but totally functional the added mouse feature is nice
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I had low expectations for this, but it works really well. You aren't going to speed type on it, but you can send an email without a problem. It is probably not going to replace your main keyboard, but it is totally usable for a portable option if you are tired of typing on your tiny phone keyboard. I like it and will probably buy more to give away as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great! As described!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, FYI sound can be turned off with fn+left arrow.
customer_reviews.author: ASI

customer_reviews.title: Works great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting used to. Works great for on the go. The mouse function is fantastic. Doesnt work well on soft or uneven surfaces. If they could make it smaller and attach it directly to a smart phone, then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't use it for everyday stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Don't use this for gaming. You can't really hold down a key with this. It's great as a compact keyboard. Takes time to get used to it though. It does not require a flat surface to work but you will need a flat surface to see what keys you are pressing
customer_reviews.author: Jinie

customer_reviews.title: This is a really fun gadget. I have a small tablet that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun gadget. I have a small tablet that I use because it's quite portable, but adding a keyboard makes for a bulky load. This product is smaller than my cell phone, although a bit thicker. I turned off the noises. I'm currently using it with both an Android tablet and a Windows 10 tablet, both successfully.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil E. NewsonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but can't get the sound to silence.
customer_reviews.text: Would be a Great product to use for work, school, library, etc, but can't get the loud beep noice to silence from every time you type a letter. For us, it defeats the purpose of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you think you can type with this.
customer_reviews.text: Contemplating if I should return it. This is just a toy for now. Don't expect you will be able to type a single sentence with this and don't drive yourself insane. I had low expectations but unfortunately, the result is lower than low. When they get the technology right and this can be quick and responsive, it will be amazing. But for now, it's not more than a toy that you will spend a minute and then put it back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Nyc37

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as a neat fun gadget that people would see and go "Wow
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! Yes, I can type faster than it can respond, and yes it doesn't work in all light or surface conditions. I purchased this as a neat fun gadget that people would see and go "Wow! That is so cool!" and that is exactly what I got. I couldn't be happier. It's small enough to fit in a shirt pocket, and it came with a charge so I could play with it right away! =)
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: so I wasn't expecting the greatest product in the world
customer_reviews.text: Got this for extremely cheap on Cyber Monday, so I wasn't expecting the greatest product in the world. It can be a bit confusing to figure out and the directions were clearly written in another language and then translated to English. Sensitivity is okay, not always 100% and it dies fast. But, for $30 and its portable size, worth the money for travel. Have successfully paired it with and iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Kira R.

customer_reviews.title: Five-minute party trick
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely not magic. They keyboard works juuuust well enough to be a party trick. To try and type a document with this would drive the most hardened man insane.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rainville

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early and works better than expected, even in a bright room. Very, very pleased! EDIT a few weeks later, still love it. Still use it every day. It has a lengthy learning curve, but works really well for two finger typing. I am so glad I bought it, and everyone gets a kick out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Herring

customer_reviews.title: a nice idea but a very buggy implementation
customer_reviews.text: Well, a nice idea but a very buggy implementation. If you buy it, know: you bought just for fun, not for work..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Marion

customer_reviews.title: TECHNOLOGY NOT QUITE THERE, YET!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quick connection from my iPhone/iPad to the Laser Keyboard. It was packaged very neat and tidy. The problem is that it simply just doesn’t work. It will work brilliantly for those who peck n hunt as they type; but I’m a quick typist and this product doesn’t support my speed. I was taught never to look at the keyboard and that’s impossible with this projection. Perhaps in a few years, once the bugs have been ironed out, this will suit me better. But until then, I cannot use it for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sera Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Doesn't work. Tried to contact the seller with no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Loveland

customer_reviews.title: I love this, It works perfect for my traveling Office
customer_reviews.text: I love this, It works perfect for my traveling Office. Takes up very little space and I don't have to worry about a key coming up missing. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Gale

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this and I couldn’t believe it actually works. Pretty cool keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My teenager son thought this was great. It works well and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My teenager son thought this was great. It works well and is easy to use. The novelty wore off quickly for him, but he still uses it if he is typing anything lengthy
customer_reviews.author: Caren Ray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really neat as long as you have a good flat surface to work on.

customer_reviews.title: Bleep!
customer_reviews.text: Great, but it emits a loud bleep with each keypress, which means I can't use it in class.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not respond consistently to finger movements. Considerably slower inputting than a traditional keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: menlojim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but really hard to get top keys ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, but really hard to get top keys to work right every time. The period is almost impossible to use. Just not a real efficient product. But fine if you want to show off. Sure glad it was on sale, I would have sent it back if I had payed full price. Good luck with yours.
customer_reviews.author: LA Renovation Pro

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing! Mind blowing! Sadly, because my windows 8 computer doesn't have Bluetooth, it didn't work, but I'm still happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!  Very good, fast service. Item as described, will order again!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Very good, fast service. Item as described, will order again!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's iphone. He says it works and he's able to do homework with it.
customer_reviews.author: elCid

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: It's works fine. We have 2 but one is off a little.
customer_reviews.author: Markatrig

customer_reviews.title: I like it but there is lots of room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I like it but there is lots of room for improvement. It only likes certain surfaces and it seems a little to sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Judge

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product if you need to do more than anything over 20 minutes,
customer_reviews.text: Product does not even work for more than 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this was pretty cool I didn’t expect it to work but it did. However sometimes it wouldn’t pick up some stuff but other that that it was amazing and made me look futuristic lol 4/5 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: gimmicky. doesn't connect well sometimes ok sometimes not causing ...
customer_reviews.text: gimmicky. doesn't connect well sometimes ok sometimes not causing the already hard typing even harder.
customer_reviews.author: Badminton4Life

customer_reviews.title: Just so cool :-D
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this thing is just so cool. I love it mainly for the "cool factor"...not so much for the practicality of it....don't get me wrong, it works...but, when I actually need to to work, I will use a regular keyboard. The surface and lighting, and angle have to be just right to have it actually work right...but, when people see it, it's just the "WOW!"...it's a fun toy to have...
customer_reviews.author: Jin Yu E Sun

customer_reviews.title: For ~$30, pretty good value!
customer_reviews.text: Pairs effortlessly with my iPhone 5...you can actually type pretty fast on this all things considered...think fast two finger typing. Sound can be easily turned down / off.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Garbe

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Works but has less than all the keys I am used to.
customer_reviews.author: TreadStone

customer_reviews.title: looks great, however
customer_reviews.text: This item came quickly, looks great, however, it just wasn't what my son expected, for beggining typing people, this may be a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quick & easy
customer_reviews.text: grandkids love it,had it up and running seconds out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for me! I don't type many words a minute, so for me, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works well but mainly in dimmer areas. Tracks keystrokes very well but you'll definitely need to turn down the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's cool but a little touchy. that's funny because you don't touch it, it's a projection. hahaha!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy it is to use with my phone
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to use with my phone. Couldn't get it to work with my Galaxy Note Pro tablet though.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Tec device but has limitations such as needing low light conditions to see keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: Best experience
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that the item will not be upto expectation but i was amazed the way it worked. really good.
customer_reviews.author: Shoaib

customer_reviews.title: i rarely freakout about cool stuff i buy but i was definetly freaking out ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the coolest thing ever. i rarely freakout about cool stuff i buy but i was definetly freaking out about this one! So cool, i even wrote this review with the keyboard! LOL, buy it. its so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Layout is awful
customer_reviews.text: With the punctuation arranged on the top row, I couldn't really use this keyboard to type effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Josh G.

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent enough to use
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work consistently for me. I had to proofread everything I typed, and more often than not you could see it wasn't picking up every key stroke as you were typing. As many stated already, it is a good novelty item. However, that effect quickly goes away if you really expect to do some typing... Great idea, wish they could make it better quality. I purchased two, one for me and one for a gift. I returned both. I'm glad I tested mine before I gave the gift.
customer_reviews.author: The Fleadoctor

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift to a friend. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Yunsheng Li

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Can't type too fast
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Can't type too fast; avoid using on textured or shiny surfaces, though.. Seems like they really mess with the IR beam
customer_reviews.author: Erik Crouch

customer_reviews.title: It really is a bad keyboard. A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It really is a bad keyboard. A waste of money. It types for me. It takes more time editing then actually typing.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun novelty item, I wouldn't use regularly, but it works and is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: ShrrgDas

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good laser keyboard. I only had a few problems till I figured out how to work the sound and brightness but it is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Jesse M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard but it's kind of hard to get use to
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: This is how it's done on the fly.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard. It is as good as it gets. For carry less and getting more.
customer_reviews.author: F.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but still have some kinks to work out...
customer_reviews.text: Everthing has flaws, especially something this new to the market, but it worked sueprisingly well! I am writing my review witg this right now, and sometimes it doesn't register my taps like it should, but I suppose it is something I will have to get used to. Overalll, GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: Evan C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised this was so pricey for what it is. I don't think I've ever successfully typed a full sentence using it and I've tried multiple times on different surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Great value for product - product not bad either !
customer_reviews.text: This worked out of the box great and paired easily with my phone. My only caveat here is that I used to be a transcriptionist and your hand position is very important. I kept sending it into cursor mode because the change over button (from cursor to keyboard mode) is right next to the space bar on the right and my right hand must lean that way when I am typing. Therefore, the "hunt and peck" method is actually better with your elbows slightly akimbo so you can type what you want and not get gobbly-guk. Overall, I really like it. It is an excellent alternative to the more pricey ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen R

customer_reviews.title: It work's good for what it is but it needs to be ...
customer_reviews.text: It work's good for what it is but it needs to be used by hunt and peck typing as to not block the direction of the sensor. It also will work better if you type slowly. Again it works as proof of concept and it is cool. You will like it but needs improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A novelty item
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. It was a novelty item. Once you played with it for awhile and showed all your friends, in reality it was too much trouble to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S. Szymczak

customer_reviews.title: EVERY time you turn it on it beeps like crazy. So if you are around people you ...
customer_reviews.text: You can really only see the light on a darker surface. Also, EVERY time you turn it on it beeps like crazy. So if you are around people you turn it on BEEEEEEEEP then you click the volume down button the keyboard if you can get it to work BEEEP BEEP BEEP beep. Until silent. Pretty annoying really. Battery life seems ok, but then again I don't ever use this thing. I would say save your money, and get something like a roll out keyboard. Or just one that doesn't beep every time you turn it on. Maybe one with built in memory, so you can set it and forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not as cool
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super fast but however the product kept typing automatically as soon as it was turned on, I was not able to do any adjustments or change settings due to that. Not sure if it was defective or just supposed to be like that. Be careful when buying.
customer_reviews.author: Fazla

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is cool for a week or two but the tech just isnt quite there to make this perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lestat Lindauer

customer_reviews.title: was disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: was disappointed... not really for work or office.. i type fast and this thing can't follow me ... sorry :(
customer_reviews.author: Glen Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Sensor Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: It works great and was surprisingly easy to operate, but it's sensor is very sensitive as long as a shadow touches a key it thinks you typed it. Not really a big issue as its a minor annoyance that you eventually get use to. Be sure to check spelling when using key board. :3
customer_reviews.author: Cesar L. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The machine makes so much noise and no instructions on how does it turns off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, but is not at all accurate.
customer_reviews.author: J. VanWagner

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Like the fast shipping and works great can't wait to use this :-) and if any one is reading this u so should get this laser projection keyboard u will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Over all decent
customer_reviews.text: This item is pretty cool. I wouldn't suggest using this item on an everyday basis because it would be kind of difficult. It is easy for the device to think you are pressing the button next to it. Over all this device was very well made. I think it shouldn't cost as much as it did. I am overall pretty happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent And Honest Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Really cool but makes an annoying click sound every time you hit a letter you can't turn it off either so after about 5 min of using it you want to shoot yourself. Cool to show off though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Present for my son. He loved the initial 'wow' factor of the laser projection keyboard but quickly grew bored with the slow and deliberate motion required to make it function properly. It's great and fun for what it is, but a functional keyboard it is not. Definitely not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: T. Besecker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The letters are light and difficult to read. Most effective in a room with moderate lighting.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated in AZ
customer_reviews.text: What a nightmare this has been! Between the product being non-functional to the impossibility of ups return, I wish I had never ordered this? What am I to do?

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good toy, but that's it. I think I'm staying with my regular keyboard instead.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good quality and is really cool too!!!

customer_reviews.text: Stop the beeps!!! I will change my rating if there is a way to disable the beeps

customer_reviews.title: it's not a bad device and it does what it says it will ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's not a bad device and it does what it says it will do. However, the annoying beeping sound will keep you from using it in public, especially someplace quiet like a library. I had to tear mine apart and damage the speaker to silence the thing. It still worked afterward, but that was a risky, last straw move. Without silencing the thing, it was useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome idea, but actual functionality is dissapointing thus far.
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. The beeping sound it makes for every key pressed is so annoying though. I tried the function key and left arrow solution to lower volume but it has not responded to the command. Am going to test once again and if this sound issue doesn't fix, will be returning this product. Tried adding photos of product but Amazon app not launching camera... after connecting and carefully typing and trying to adjust the volume, was able to turn it off but CAPS stays locked and it is frustrating more than helpful. I will probably return this
customer_reviews.author: Unherduf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: It is great but it doesn't say to charge it on or off or how long.

customer_reviews.title: It "works", but is more of a gimmicky thing ...
customer_reviews.text: It "works", but is more of a gimmicky thing. It takes 3 times as long to type out sentences because it is very inaccurate and you have to correct wrong letters for nearly every word. Also, each time you use it, you have to change the incredibly loud sound volume... was it designed by the deaf??
